name: BioMarine Organization SAS
memberOrga: to have accessto our member list you must be part of our BioMarine community. the registration is free at https://biomarine.org
goal:
BioMarine is an industry & investment platform,dedicated to the blue bio industry. Our core activity is to foster business opportunities and contacts between top executives. It is a unique CEOs and key stakeholder’s platform dedicated to marine bio resources. With our annual platform, an our online community, BioMarine can quickly identify and the select potential companies to work on/ for our main projects


BioMarine is structured in strict accordance with the ‘three-thirds’ principle: namely, Industry, Science and Investors. This principle aims to:

- Foster business opportunities by facilitating international collaborative work
- Turn innovation and applied research into value creation
_ Facilitate the implementation of existing opportunities to benefit both consumers and civil society

BioMarine is supporting and developping 3 main projects:
1- The set up of an international cooperative of marine ingredient producers
2- The development of a blue bio plastic consortium
3- The launch of an investment fund dedicated to the blue bio industry
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU initiatives directly linked to blue growth and environment, national frameworks, financing and funding

Blue Bio Plastic

Reforestation of marine coastal areas

Financing of stage 2,3 _ SMEs in pre comemrcial to growing stage
